text: I'm amazed at how close to reality this dream is all the time. Not to be all schmaltzy but I love the work we do and the future we all make together!
Agreed. I also liked that my dream had considered practical matters. You first had to raise your arm to trigger the armpit to listen. Schmaltz away
And while it wasn't explicitly a narrative in the dream, I did think about battery life and general armpit connectivity (to internet and other devices)
